name: Florus
description:
Florus is a procedurally generated interactive musical garden.

Spawn and move different plants to manipulate the music!

Made for for ProcJam 2016.

Music by m.soundcloud.com/m_t_h_s  (Connor Byard)

Follow us on Twitter! @JacobMegatree @ConnorByard @MegatreeGames

Update: Fixed bug causing the game to run incorrectly on certain PCs .
